ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Has this ever happened to you?? and what can 	you do when it does
ygData.msgSnippet: I personally don t think you did anything wrong..you basically pulled for camp 1 even though you did not mean to and all the group did was let you get pounded
ygData.messageBody:
I personally don't think you did anything wrong..you basically pulled for camp 1 even though you did not mean to and all the group did was let you get pounded so you ran off to save your life which is what I would of done in that situation.  That group might of all been afk (doubt it) and when they got back on they thought that you trained them on purpose...but anyway if all their gonna do in the game is cause you problems then they are all immature and don't have much of a life.  If it happens again you should take a screen shot of what they said and tell a gm about it..if he asks for the proof then you have it all right there...it'll take like a week to get a response back but thats the only sure way to take care of this problem...that or either ignore them.  This kind of thing happened to me in Echo Caverns..I was wondering around looking for a spot to solo when this needlite comes out and attacks me from behind.  I see a group of 3 people nearby in the needlite camp and I tell them I have a mob for you guys but all they did was sit there.they had no mobs in their area.  I tell them again but I still get no response.  By this time I lost about 2 bubs of health so I said screw it and killed it off.  Later I get a shout telling everyone in the zone I am a KSer..now let me get this right isn't KSing killing a mob that someone else is already fighting?  Or am I wrong?  

Dabruiser Troll
Warrior of the 29th Season 
 

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Clay" <wolffmanus@y...> wrote:
> I have
been playing EQ for about 2 years and enjoying every min.
of
> it. I
play for only about 1 to 2 hours a day (maybe) so I really
get
> in
to my time in the game. This sunday something new happened to
me.
> I
have a 24th level Bar. shaman and have been grouping in Pav.
> Caverns to
work up in levels. I logged on and ooc'ed asking to
group.
> I got
not responce. I went to camp 1 aqnd found a good mixed group
> working it
very well (8 people mixed classes teaming very nicely)
so
> I went to
camp 2, There were 5 people 3 casters (2 mages and a
necro)
> a
ranger and a fighter) all around 19 to 20., all at 100% health.
I
>
asked if they wanted a healer/buffer and got "Shouted down" "This
> Camp
is TAKEN GO AWAY"!!!....ok so I truned and started back. I
got
>
jumped by 3 of the bandits. I Camp was not doing anything so I
pulled
> the mobs back in to the camp and ooced here is your mobs take them
I
> don't want to steal your kills(all the time I am getting
pounded) ..
> no one said anything so I ran .. about 1/2 way back I
get
ooc'ed "WTF
> Frezz wait..." as I as all ready near the cave to
SH and the zone
I
> just left... the "group" because of 5 mobs brok
camp and ran (as
they
> ran they pulled 2 more) and "telled" me to
death about how they
were
> going to cause me problems every time
they see me and ect...
>
>
> A. did I do wrong by trying to
"not steal" the camp's mobs
>
> b. what do I do about the
"problems" I might have later by thes
> people?
>
>
>  I like doing the right thing and playing with people not causeing
> problems for others...
>
> Frezslice
> 24 circle
Shaman of the North
